content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: TSPARM
      operator: longer_than
      value: 40
Core:
  Id: CORE-000148
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Trigger error when length of TSPARM value is greater than 40
Outcome:
  Message: Length of TSPARM is greater than 40
  Output Variables:
    - TSPARM
    - TSPARMCD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0258
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The value in TSPARM cannot be longer than 40 characters.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.4.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TS

json.Description: Trigger error when length of TSPARM value is greater than 40

Outcome.Message: Length of TSPARM is greater than 40

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The value in TSPARM cannot be longer than 40 characters.
